name: git-hex-resolve-conflict-walkthrough
description: Guide resolving a paused rebase/merge/cherry-pick using git-hex conflict tools

repoPath.description: Absolute path to the target git repository (required when multiple roots are configured)

subject.description: Optional: what you were trying to do when conflicts happened

details.description: Optional context: any constraints, preferred resolutions, etc.

includeContent.description: If true, include base/ours/theirs snippets in conflict status (can be large)

maxContentSize.description: Max bytes per content field when includeContent=true
